document_data.name: Sarah
document_data.mainbody:
'''Sarah''' was an ambassador from [[Amn]] who served her nation in the lands abroad during the midâ€“14{{th}} centruy [[DR]].

{{Quote|I am Sarah, an emissary from the nation of Amn. I have been sent to this barbaric city to help bridge the misunderstandings between our two peoples.}}
document_data.Personality: In contrast to her important position in Amnian foreign relations, Sarah had a rather poor opinion of the lands of the [[Sword Coast]] north of her home.
document_data.History: As rising tensions between Amn and the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] intensified during the [[Iron crisis]] in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Sarah was dispatched to help negotiate peace. She arrived at the city some time before the attempted takeover of the [[Council of Four]] by [[Sarevok Anchev]], staying at the [[Helm and Cloak]] in the [[Baldur's Gate/Temples District|Temples District]] of the [[Baldur's Gate/Upper City|Upper City]].
